org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class PermissionTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.PermissionTemplate

public class PermissionTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

Models the permission request template used to generate letters and emails to Authorisation Agents.

Author:
bprice
